name: Space Runner (Vinny Casasanta)
description:
Greetings!

Thanks for landing on my first game.

My name is Vinny and I've been a content creator and designer for around a decade now.  I am nearing the end of my twenties, and like most of us in that boat, rethinking my life in a real way.  In trying to figure out a way to combine all of my skills, and capitalize on my 'Jack of All Trades' character, I've bluntly decided to pursue game development.

For those of you that have game dev experience, and love to patronize people who are just starting out, criticizing the naivety of the beginning of a journey because frankly, you know the absolute best, thanks. We certainly need more of you around in our lives.  But for those who love to think bigger, and see the world as an opportunity for boundless creative innovation at any level, thanks for meeting me at this point in my journey. 

This is the first of many games I'll make, and the first of many sh**ty games I'll make, but it would mean the world to me if you supported me at the beginning. I've given away a lot of free content throughout my creative journey, and I'm just now learning how to value the work I put in.  If you're a fellow creative I'm sure you understand. 

Try it out and if you like it, let me know what you loved, and if you didn't, let me know what could have been improved. Much love out there and keep making sh*t.
